headline.main: NAZIS CLAIM GAINS IN SMOLENSK LINE; Report Thrusting a Wedge Into Strong Point and Stopping Counter-Attacks

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Tuesday, June 1 (AP) -- The Germans claimed to have driven a wedge into Russian lines above Smolensk yesterday, and both sides reported thrusts and parries of scouting raids as June brought the traditional month of best fighting weather to the long Russian front today.
